text: dear mr. president I am old I am sick
and I want to come home please help me
the Boxing Day plea from Warren
Weinstein a 72 year old American aid
worker held hostage in Pakistan for more
than two years I came to Pakistan to
help my government and I did so at a
time when most Americans would not come
here and now I need my government it
seems that I have been totally abandoned
and forgotten he was abducted here in
Lahore just months after the American
raid that killed Osama bin Laden in a
Pakistani town to the north the man
holding him is understood to be bin
Laden's successor Ayman al-zawahiri he
demands an end to American drone strikes
and the release of al-qaeda prisoners
held by the United States only then he
says will Warren Weinstein be allowed to
return to his family at home the tension
is taking its toll speaking to the BBC
earlier this year
mr. Weinstein's family said they felt
helpless tell us what we can do to get
him back because anything they've said
in the past on their videos is something
that people like us have no control over
whatsoever we are just private citizens
we're on our own I mean they're aware of
the situation but we're very much one
around in the past the US State
Department has said it is working with
Pakistani authorities to secure his
release until then the anxiety will
continue for Warren Weinstein and his
family
Rick enmity via BBC News
